name: Elizabeth Kress
description: Elizabeth Kressis a former president ofMilitech, and later the president ofNew United States of America. She was instrumental in keeping the NUSA together in the wake of theFourth Corporate Warand rebuilding the country. Elizabeth had her own interests, and turned the NUSA into a functional dictatorship for many years. Elizabeth was born in a smallUSAAir Force hospital onOkinawa,Japanin1978. Her father was a major in theUnited States Armed Forces, a distinguished officer with twenty years of experience. At the age of twenty-two, Elizabeth graduated from the Air Force Academy atColorado...
